title: How to have three-way calling in conversation? How to switch the call?
answer:
During the call, you can do other operations on the bottom of the calling screen.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926091423117001.png)  

During the multiple calls, you can press ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926091448984001.png)  to switch the call.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926091507952001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926091516477001.png)
